description:
The daughter of Jennie (1883 - 1916) and John Whittier.
Pollyanna is the main focus of the story.
After becoming an orphan at a young age, she is to move in with her maternal aunt, Polly, who seems to only think about punishing her for she is not the young lady worth of the Harrington family that she expects her to be.
Instead she is a cheerful, happy, energetic young girl who is always seeing the good in things and people.
Whomever Pollyanna meets is touched by the way she sees the world, and changes. Pollyanna is leaving a handprint on people`s hearts.
Her best friend is a chipmunk.
name: Pollyanna Whittier
